---
name: "Bug Report"
about: "Report a defect in the specification or examples."
title: "Bug: <short_description>"
labels: ["bug"]
---

# Issue
Describe the bug.

# Location
File, section, line number (if applicable).

# Expected
What the spec *should* say or do.

# Actual
What the spec *currently* says or does.

# Impact
Why this matters for correctness.

# Suggested Fix
Optional proposal.
